mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID as member_id , MEMBER_PASSWORD as member_password , MEMBER_NICKNAME as member_nickname , MEMBER_NAME as member_name , MEMBER_BIRTH as member_birth , MEMBER_LAST_CONNECTION as member_last_connection , MEMBER_INTEREST1 as member_interest1 , MEMBER_INTEREST2 as member_interest2 , MEMBER_INTEREST3 as member_interest3 , MEMBER_LEVEL as member_level , MEMBER_PROFILE_IMG as member_profile_img , MEMBER_WARNING as member_warning , MEMBER_SEX as member_sex , MEMBER_PARTNER_ID as member_partner_id , MEMBER_INTRODUCTION as member_introduction , MEMBER_COUNTRY as member_country FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
